title: *PATREON PREVIEW* CHROME-19 Pt. II with John Januzzi
description:
You can bet your buff, robust ass our second batch of absolutely scrumptious podcasting with the one and only John Jannuzzi is ready for munching just behind the paywall. John dials back in with the boys for our first ever true doubleheader as the maniacal marathon continues, including, but not limited to: the legend of white socks with loafers, planning a book rollout in the midst of a global pandemic, beating off, a complete and utter lack of sports trivia knowledge, Twitter, brainstorming the Jannuzzi’s Cookies x Throwing Fits collab, tales from flavor R&D, going to a hairdresser instead of a barber, the most lucrative revenue streams, no show socks vs. raw dogging and much more.
 
For more Throwing Fits, check us out on Patreon: www.patreon.com/throwingfits.
